graph_title: Number of in-house trainings per year
indicator_name: Number of trainings offered by the district office on gender-sensitive language use
target_name: Measure - Awareness training on gender-sensitive language use
source_organisation_1: Bezirksamt Treptow-Köpenick - Serviceeinheit Personal und Finanzen
page_content: The indicator shows the number of in-house training sessions on gender-sensitive language use in the administration.

de.page_content: Der Indikator zeigt die Anzahl der Inhouse-Schulungen zum gendersensiblen Sprachgebrauch in der Verwaltung.
